synopsis.text: Middle school student Hiro Amanokawa stumbles upon a world unseen by ordinary people when he activates a mysterious device left by his father, known as a 'Digivice'. In a near future where technology has advanced, rumors of 'hologram ghosts' have been circulating on social media, with reports of people falling victim to these spectral entities. As Hiro delves deeper into this mystery, he encounters Gammamon, a mischievous Digimon entrusted to him by his father. Together, they find themselves embroiled in a series of bizarre phenomena involving sinister creatures like the 'Mouth Sewing Man' and the 'Mummy Man'. As they navigate this hidden world, Hiro and Gammamon, along with their friends, must uncover the truth behind these hologram ghosts and protect humanity from their malevolent intentions. Join Hiro and his companions as they embark on a thrilling adventure into the enigmatic world of Digimon.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
